statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_id, quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY product_id
SELECT customer_id, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT purchase_date, product_id, quantity FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name AS Name, loyalty_points AS Points FROM customers ORDER BY Points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name FROM customers
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, product_name, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-06-01' AND sale_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_category FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.item_price FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5;
